servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P2177: System Too Lean Off Idle Bank 1

entry.ptxt: Air / fuel ratio on bank 1 is unchanged from lean state for specified time at specified driving condition.

item.ptxt: MAF & IAT sensor and/or its circuit

ptxt.emph: P2178: System Too Rich Off Idle Bank 1

entry.ptxt: Air / fuel ratio on bank 1 is unchanged from rich state for specified time at specified driving condition.

ptxt.emph: P2179: System Too Lean Off Idle Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Air / fuel ratio on bank 2 is unchanged from lean state for specified time at specified driving condition.

ptxt.emph: P2180: System Too Rich Off Idle Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Air / fuel ratio on bank 2 is unchanged from rich state for specified time at specified driving condition.

ptxt.emph: P2187: System Too Lean at Idle Bank 1

entry.ptxt: Long term fuel trim on bank 1 based on engine torque and engine speed is higher than 5.5% at idling condition.

ptxt.emph: P2188: System Too Rich at Idle Bank 1

entry.ptxt: Long term fuel trim on bank 1 based on engine torque and engine speed is lower than –5.5% at idling condition.

ptxt.emph: P2189: System Too Lean at Idle Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Long term fuel trim on bank 2 based on engine torque and engine speed is higher than 5.5% at idling condition.

ptxt.emph: P2190: System Too Rich at Idle Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Long term fuel trim on bank 2 based on engine torque and engine speed is lower than –5.5% at idling condition.

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.
If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 60 – 80 km/h (37 – 50 mile/h) for 10 min. (keep throttle valve opening constant in this step.)

item.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Run engine at idle speed for 10 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: Engine oil level check

test1.ptxt: Check oil filler cap and oil level gauge for looseness.
If conditions of cap and gauge are OK, check engine oil level.

testgroup.question: Is engine oil level within specified level?

action.ptxt: Adjust engine oil to specified level.

testgroup.title: Coolant level check
testgroup.question: Is coolant level within specified level?

testgroup.title: Air intake system and exhaust system check

test1.ptxt: Check air intake system, exhaust system, vacuum hoses and PCV hoses for clogging or leakage.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: MAF & IAT sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check MAF & IAT sensor and its circuit as follows

item.ptxt: MAF sensor and its circuit: Refer to Step 2 through 5 under DTC P0100 / P0102 / P0103:N32A .
IAT sensor and its circuit: Refer to Step 2 through 3 under DTC P0112 / P0113:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: HO2S, HO2S heater, HO2S circuit and HO2S heater circuit check

test1.ptxt: For bank related to DTC, check the following items.

item.ptxt: HO2S circuit: Refer to Step 3 under DTC P0132 / P0137 / P0138 / P0152 / P0157 / P0158:N32A .
HO2S heater circuit: Refer to Step 2 through 3 under DTC P0030 / P0031 / P0032 / P0036 / P0037 / P0038 / P0050 / P0051 / P0052 / P0056 / P0057 / P0058:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check engine mechanical part or system which can cause engine rough idle or poor performance.

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace HO2S-1 of bank related to DTC.
Perform confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P2177, P2178, P2179, P2180, P2187, P2188, P2189 or P2190 still detected?

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace HO2S-2 of bank related to DTC.
Perform confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P2177, P2178, P2179, P2180, P2187, P2188, P2189 or P2190 still detected?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
